body.section: Hierarchy PerpetratorOfAbuseOrNeglectRecord is a kind of HistoryOfAbuseOrNeglectRecord

section.title: Description
section.p: This class is intended to record any additional attributes required to describe a history of abuse from the perspective of the perpetrator. This is not typical but it is an optional content of a behavioral health record.

stentry.p: This coded attribute may be used to indicate that the patient is a registered sex offender, convicted of arson, etc.
